title: A State Of Trance Classics - The Full Unmixed Versions
description:
A State Of Trance Classics ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ The Full Unmixed Versions.

(Not to be mixed with Armin van Buurens ASOT series)


A State Of Trance is proud to present 36 trance classics on 4 CDs in the full version. A perfect tool for all djs to upgrade their trance collection on CD. This impressive collection brings you a perfect trip to memory lane when you experience some of old-time classics like the trance breakthrough with "Out of the Blue" by System F and "Communication" by Armin van Buuren. Looking at the trance classics polls "Born Slippy" by Underworld is always at the top of the lists. The crowd will definitely bring up their glow-sticks with classics as "Zombie Nation" by Kernkraft 400, "Silence" by Delerium, "Urban Train" by Tiesto and "Rapture" by iio. Almost six hours in trance!


Tracklist

CD 1
1. Delerium Feat. Sarah Mclachlan - Silence (Tiesto's "In Search Of Sunrise" Remix)
2. B.B.E. - Seven Days And One Week
3. System F - Out Of The Blue
4. Armin Van Buuren - Communication Part One
5. Motorcycle - As The Rush Comes (Sweeping Strings Mix)
7. Veracocha - Carte Blanche
8. Underworld - Born Slippy 
9. Three Drives On A Vinyl - Greece 2000

CD 2
10. Gouryella - Gouryella
11. Iio - Rapture (John Creamer & Stephane K Remix)
12. Yahel - Voyage
13. Perpetuous Dreamer - The Sound Of Goodbye (Armin's Tribal Feel)
14. Carlos - The Silmarillia
15. System F - Cry
16. Art Of Trance - Madagascar (Ferry Corsten Remix)
17. Ridgewalkers Ft. El - Find (Andy Moor Remix)
18. Hybrid - Finished Symphony 

CD 3
19. Tiesto - Suburban Train
20. Armin Van Buuren - Blue Fear (Original 1996 Mix)
21. Age Of Love - Age Of Love (Jam & Spoon Watch Out For Stella Mix)
22. Pulser - Cloudwalking ( Astral Mix)
23. Solid Sessions - Janeiro 
24. Solid Globe - Sahara
25. Kamaya Painters - Endless Wave
26. The Quest - C-Sharp
27. The Thrillseekers - Synaesthesia 

CD 4
28. System F Ft. Armin Van Buuren - Exhale
29. Gouryella - Tenshi
30. Ralphie B. - Massive 
31. Andain - Beautiful Things (Gabriel & Dresden's Unplugged Mix)
32. Galaxia - Moonman
33. Moogwai - Viola ( Armin Van Buuren Remix)
34. L.S.G. - Netherworld
35. Gabriel & Dresden - Arcadia
36. Kernkraft 400 - Zombie Nation



Everything ripped in Lossless FLAC encoding (up to 1000kB/s!) for absolutely amazing quality (hence the big size of this upload). I'm sure you'll all be satisfied with the crisp sound of these trance classics witch will never be forgotten!

Enjoy this fine release and please, seed!
